CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Nickel
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: nickel
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Nickel is a resilient, corrosion-resistant metal that enhances the strength and longevity of its alloy counterparts. Its steadfast durability makes it a critical element in high-performance industrial applications.
